name: MekMare
description:
Welcome to ...  MEKMARE!

You awake in a room full of discarded prototypes. 

Looking down at yourself, you see that you are enhanced with all kinds of strange technologies that were not there before. pipes, metal. you don't remember this!

Suddenly a Voice sounds from all around you... 

"You were not supposed to reawaken!" it spits over the intercom.
Suddenly, sounds of feet clattering are all around you,  and you realize the only way out is to fight. 

You grab a discarded pistol from nearby and stand up. the clanking gets louder and cybernetic enemies start flowing in from the corners of the room. coming straight for you, to destroy you...

Time to find out who did this to you, and make them pay....

Here begins your own...  MekMare.*

*(Mechanical Nightmare)
